name: charity-commission-gov-uk
description: This npm package is a wrapper for V1 of the UK Charity Commission API. This package allows you to search the comissions data. This package uses promises. You will need to register as a developer to receive your API key; please visit http://apps.charitycommission.gov.uk/Showcharity/APIConsole/APIConsoleHome.aspx
author: Imran Nazir <imran.nazir@yahoo.co.uk>
